src:
WRAP | Champions League

07 Nov 2019, 06:48

Cape Town - A comprehensive wrap of all the fixtures, kick-off times, results and match reports from this week's Champions League action:

TUESDAY, NOVEMBER 5

Barcelona 0-0 Slavia Prague - MATCH REPORT
Zenit St. Petersburg 0-2 RB Leipzig - MATCH REPORT
Liverpool 2-1 Genk - MATCH REPORT
Chelsea 4-4 Ajax - MATCH REPORT
Napoli 1-1 RB Salzburg - MATCH REPORT 
Borussia Dortmund 3-2 Inter Milan - MATCH REPORT
Valencia 4-1 Lille - MATCH REPORT
Lyon 3-1 Benfica - MATCH REPORT

WEDNESDAY, NOVEMBER 6

Bayern Munich 2-0 Olympiacos - MATCH REPORT
Lokomotiv Moscow 1-2 Juventus - MATCH REPORT
Atalanta 1-1 Manchester City - MATCH REPORT
Bayer Leverkusen 2-1 Atletico Madrid - MATCH REPORT
Dinamo Zagreb 3-3 Shakhtar Donetsk - MATCH REPORT
PSG 1-0 Club Brugge- MATCH REPORT
Real Madrid 6-0 Galatasaray - MATCH REPORT
Red Star Belgrade 0-4 Tottenham Hotspur - MATCH REPORT
